data.text:
@willemhuman @yasserogier @neilbosworth 

Hi guys. JHB just provided me with the link to this service. I am not sure if this is the same one we use to get the daily admin order data from them. 

http://cdms.lawcredit.co.za/cdmswebmethods/service.asmx

There are two methods in there that should return the images to us

DocumentGetImages and DocumentGetImagesForBureauApp. Could you please have a look and see if this would be sufficient, otherwise we can get in contact with Heron to make changes.

Thanks
